title: transmitter frequency
extract: In a frequency modulation (FM) transmitter, it is added by varying the radio signal's frequency slightly. ... The radio signal from the transmitter is applied to the antenna, which radiates the energy as radio waves.
extract_html: In a frequency modulation (FM) transmitter, it is added by varying the radio signal's frequency slightly. ... The radio signal from the transmitter is applied to the antenna, which radiates the energy as radio waves.
